feature.title: Certified pre-owned
feature.description: Get a phone that looks - and works - just like new. Boost certified pre-owned phones are inspected, tested and equipped with the latest software. Learn more

feature.title: Nationwide Sprint<sup>®</sup> 3G Network
feature.description: Fast surfing, messaging, downloading—that's the power of 3G.

feature.title: Nationwide Sprint® 3G Network and Nationwide Sprint® 4G LTE Network

feature.title: Dual Mode 3G/4G
feature.description: With dual mode, switch seamlessly to the quickest data coverage available on Sprint's reliable 3G Nationwide Network and over 70 markets with Sprint's 4G (WiMAX).

feature.title: Chat and Date
feature.description: Meet new people, share your thoughts, and more. Choose from some of the most popular chat services out there. There's even one specially for Spanish speakers. Or choose from millions of potential mates through services like Match.com<sup>®</sup> Mobile, Lavalife<sup>®</sup>, and Mobilove. There's even a site specially for Spanish speakers.

feature.title: Connect
feature.description: It's all your social connections, all in one place. Link to Facebook<sup>®</sup>, MySpace™, YouTube™, Flickr<sup>®</sup>, and more all at the same time. Get updates, alerts, photos, and invites delivered to your phone instantly, all in one place.

feature.title: Contact Backup
feature.description: Back yourself up. Store your contacts online for safekeeping and easy transfer between phones.

Mobile Alerts
feature.description: Entertainment headlines, sports scores, hot pix, and other fun stuff - sent right to your phone. Sign up to receive alerts on your phone. Real-time sports scores, Comedy Central's Joke of the Day, MTV News, our hunk/babe of the week, and many more.

feature.title: Mobile Search
feature.description: Instantly search for stuff on the web or on your phone. News, weather, sports, directions... even games and ringtones.

feature.title: MyPix
feature.description: See. Snap. Share. MyPix is your place on the web to store, organize, and share the photos and videos you take with your Virgin Mobile phone. From MyPix Online, you can send pictures directly to Facebook<sup>®</sup>, Flickr<sup>®</sup>, Photobucket, Blogger, MobileMe, and lots of other blogs and photo-sharing sites.

feature.title: MySpace™
feature.description: Take your friends with you wherever you go. Don't miss out on a single comment with MySpace on your phone. Keep up on your comments and messages around the clock or update your photos, blogs and more, right from your phone.

feature.title: Opera Mini™
feature.description: Enjoy a faster, fuller web experience with a free download of Opera Mini which optimizes each webpage for your phone. That means faster page downloads and speedier scrolling.
